Yes, exactly. In fact this can be applied to not only HyperNEAT neural 
sub=
strates, but generally any 2D/3D mesh structure. The CPPN can still 
take o=
nly 4 inputs (2 points), but it can have another output that can 
be used t=
o draw the picture of 2D spatial CPPN, ignoring the other 2 
inputs. But I =
need to warn you that this is not the best method yet. 
It is just stuff to=
 try out.
